results.title: Recent advances in the field of caloric restriction mimetics and anti-aging molecules.
results.text_hl: Conventional @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Restrictive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002313 @@@CR@@@ mimetics such as @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Sirolimus @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020123 @@@rapamycin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Spermidine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013095 @@@spermidine@@@ activate autophagy, leading to recycling of cellular components and improvement of physiological function.

citations.NLM: Martel J, Chang SH, Wu CY, Peng HH, Hwang TL, Ko YF, Young JD, Ojcius DM. Recent advances in the field of caloric restriction mimetics and anti-aging molecules. Ageing Res Rev. 2021 Mar;66():101240. PMID: 33347992
citations.BibTeX: @article{33347992, title={Recent advances in the field of caloric restriction mimetics and anti-aging molecules.}, author={Martel J and Chang SH and Wu CY and Peng HH and Hwang TL and Ko YF and Young JD and Ojcius DM}, journal={Ageing Res Rev}, volume={66}, pages={101240}}

results.title: Targeting ageing and preventing organ degeneration with metformin.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: Various studies have found that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can target several nutrient-sensing, anti-ageing and immune pathways, leading to reductions in oxidative stress, @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@ and DNA damage as well as providing effects similar to those of calorie @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Restrictive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002313 @@@restriction@@@.

citations.NLM: Sunjaya AP, Sunjaya AF. Targeting ageing and preventing organ degeneration with metformin. Diabetes Metab. 2021 Feb;47(1):101203. PMID: 33148437
citations.BibTeX: @article{33148437, title={Targeting ageing and preventing organ degeneration with metformin.}, author={Sunjaya AP and Sunjaya AF}, journal={Diabetes Metab}, volume={47}, number={1}, pages={101203}}

results.title: Still Living Better through Chemistry: An Update on Caloric Restriction and Caloric Restriction Mimetics as Tools to Promote Health and Lifespan
results.text_hl: Many compounds, such as @CHEMICAL_Sirolimus @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020123 @@@rapamycin@@@ (and its derivatives), @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, or other naturally occurring products in our diets (nutraceuticals), induce @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Restrictive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002313 @@@CR@@@-like states in laboratory models.

citations.NLM: Almendáriz-Palacios C, Mousseau DD, Eskiw CH, Gillespie ZE. Still Living Better through Chemistry: An Update on Caloric Restriction and Caloric Restriction Mimetics as Tools to Promote Health and Lifespan Int J Mol Sci. 2020 Dec 3;21(23):. PMID: 33287232
citations.BibTeX: @article{33287232, title={Still Living Better through Chemistry: An Update on Caloric Restriction and Caloric Restriction Mimetics as Tools to Promote Health and Lifespan}, author={Almendáriz-Palacios C and Mousseau DD and Eskiw CH and Gillespie ZE}, journal={Int J Mol Sci}, volume={21}, number={23}}

results.title: Metformin for patients with diabetes and concomitant renal restrictions--is there an evidence base?
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ for @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ and concomitant @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Restrictive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002313 @@@renal restrictions@@@--is there an evidence base?

citations.NLM: Sharif A. Metformin for patients with diabetes and concomitant renal restrictions--is there an evidence base? QJM. 2013 Mar;106(3):291-4. PMID: 23349404
citations.BibTeX: @article{23349404, title={Metformin for patients with diabetes and concomitant renal restrictions--is there an evidence base?}, author={Sharif A}, journal={QJM}, volume={106}, number={3}, pages={291-4}}

results.title: Metformin supplementation and life span in Fischer-344 rats.
results.journal: J Gerontol A Biol Sci Med Sci
results.text_hl: To more directly test the potential of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ supplementation (300 mg/kg/day) as a @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Restrictive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002313 @@@CR@@@ mimetic, life-span studies were performed in @CELLLINE_CVCL:V767 @@@Fischer-344@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ and compared with ad libitum feeding and @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Restrictive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002313 @@@CR@@@ (30%).

citations.NLM: Smith DL Jr, Elam CF Jr, Mattison JA, Lane MA, Roth GS, Ingram DK, Allison DB. Metformin supplementation and life span in Fischer-344 rats. J Gerontol A Biol Sci Med Sci. 2010 May;65(5):468-74. PMID: 20304770
citations.BibTeX: @article{20304770, title={Metformin supplementation and life span in Fischer-344 rats.}, author={Smith DL Jr and Elam CF Jr and Mattison JA and Lane MA and Roth GS and Ingram DK and Allison DB}, journal={J Gerontol A Biol Sci Med Sci}, volume={65}, number={5}, pages={468-74}}

results.title: Dietary restriction and the pursuit of effective mimetics.
results.text_hl: Several such compounds, including @CHEMICAL_Sirolimus @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020123 @@@rapamycin@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Resveratrol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077185 @@@resveratrol@@@, have been identified as potential @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Restrictive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002313 @@@DR@@@ mimetics.

citations.NLM: Selman C. Dietary restriction and the pursuit of effective mimetics. Proc Nutr Soc. 2014 May;73(2):260-70. PMID: 24411076
citations.BibTeX: @article{24411076, title={Dietary restriction and the pursuit of effective mimetics.}, author={Selman C}, journal={Proc Nutr Soc}, volume={73}, number={2}, pages={260-70}}

results.title: Calorie restriction mimetics: an emerging research field.
results.text_hl: For example, drugs that inhibit glycolysis (@CHEMICAL_Deoxyglucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003847 @@@2-deoxyglucose@@@), enhance @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ action (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@), or affect stress signaling pathways (@CHEMICAL_Resveratrol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077185 @@@resveratrol@@@), are being assessed as @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Restrictive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002313 @@@CR@@@ mimetics (CRM).

citations.NLM: Ingram DK, Zhu M, Mamczarz J, Zou S, Lane MA, Roth GS, deCabo R. Calorie restriction mimetics: an emerging research field. Aging Cell. 2006 Apr;5(2):97-108. PMID: 16626389
citations.BibTeX: @article{16626389, title={Calorie restriction mimetics: an emerging research field.}, author={Ingram DK and Zhu M and Mamczarz J and Zou S and Lane MA and Roth GS and deCabo R}, journal={Aging Cell}, volume={5}, number={2}, pages={97-108}}

results.title: Metformin Induces a Dietary Restriction-Like State and the Oxidative Stress Response to Extend C. elegans Healthspan via AMPK, LKB1, and SKN-1
results.text_hl: That @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ does not further increase median lifespan in a @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Restrictive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002313 @@@DR@@@-constitutive genetic background suggests that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ acts through a @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Restrictive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002313 @@@DR@@@ mechanism.

citations.NLM: Onken B, Driscoll M. Metformin Induces a Dietary Restriction-Like State and the Oxidative Stress Response to Extend C. elegans Healthspan via AMPK, LKB1, and SKN-1 PLoS One. 2010 Jan 18;5(1):e8758. PMID: 20090912
citations.BibTeX: @article{20090912, title={Metformin Induces a Dietary Restriction-Like State and the Oxidative Stress Response to Extend C. elegans Healthspan via AMPK, LKB1, and SKN-1}, author={Onken B and Driscoll M}, journal={PLoS One}, volume={5}, number={1}, pages={e8758}}

results.title: Systems biology of aging in four species.
results.text_hl: In @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@, comparing the gene expression profiles of several drugs to the gene expression profile of @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Restrictive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002313 @@@caloric restriction@@@ identified @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ as a drug whose action could potentially mimic @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Restrictive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002313 @@@caloric restriction@@@ in vivo.

citations.NLM: Zahn JM, Kim SK. Systems biology of aging in four species. Curr Opin Biotechnol. 2007 Aug;18(4):355-9. PMID: 17681777
citations.BibTeX: @article{17681777, title={Systems biology of aging in four species.}, author={Zahn JM and Kim SK}, journal={Curr Opin Biotechnol}, volume={18}, number={4}, pages={355-9}}
